column3: I realize that the way `CamelCase` was written, it implied UpperCamelCase, but I still did a double take as I have only ever seen camelCase refer to lowerCamelCase.
> Variable and namespace names are all lowercase, and may use _ to separate words.\n\nThis describes what is called "snake_case". Maybe the documentation should mention that too.
Interesting; I had never heard of PascalCase, and only seen CamelCase to refer to it.
That is interesting ;) I made another revision: `UpperCamelCase (PascalCase)`.
